name: part_009
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel and Usada Pekora perform the song "Chicken Rice" on a festive Christmas-themed stage.
Noel cheers on a hamster character named Daisan as he runs on a power-generating wheel to light up a giant Christmas tree.

subtitles.original: 昔話を語り出すと決まって
subtitles.english: Whenever I start telling stories about the past,

subtitles.original: 貧乏自慢ですかと言う顔するやつ
subtitles.english: people give me that look like, "Are you boasting about being poor?"

subtitles.original: でもあれだけ貧乏だったんだ
subtitles.english: But we really were that poor,

subtitles.original: せめて自慢くらいさせてくれ
subtitles.english: so at least let me boast about it a little.

subtitles.original: 最後は笑いに変えるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll turn it into a laugh in the end.

subtitles.original: 今の子供に嫌がられるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if kids today would find it annoying.

subtitles.original: 今日はクリスマス
subtitles.english: Today is Christmas.

subtitles.original: 街は賑やか お祭り騒ぎ
subtitles.english: The city is bustling with festive excitement.

subtitles.original: 七面鳥はやっぱり照れる
subtitles.english: Turkey still makes me feel a bit self-conscious.

subtitles.original: 俺はまだまだチキンライスでいいや
subtitles.english: I'm still happy with just chicken rice.

subtitles.original: 今ならなんだって注文できる
subtitles.english: Nowadays, I can order whatever I want.

subtitles.original: 親の顔色を気にしてチキンライス
subtitles.english: But I used to order chicken rice, worrying about my parents.

subtitles.original: 頼む事なんて今はしなくても良い
subtitles.english: I don't have to worry about what to order now.

subtitles.original: 好きなもの何でも頼めるさ
subtitles.english: I can order anything I like.

subtitles.original: 酸っぱい湯気が立ち込める向こう
subtitles.english: Beyond the sour steam rising up,

subtitles.original: 見えた笑顔が今も忘れられない
subtitles.english: I still can't forget the smile I saw back then.

subtitles.original: 今日はクリスマス
subtitles.english: Today is Christmas.

subtitles.original: 街は賑やか お祭り騒ぎ
subtitles.english: The city is bustling with festive excitement.

subtitles.original: でかいケーキ持ってこい
subtitles.english: Bring on a giant cake!

subtitles.original: でもまあ全部食べ切れるサイズのもな
subtitles.english: But well, let it be a size I can actually finish.

subtitles.original: 赤坂プリンス押さえとけ
subtitles.english: Book a room at the Akasaka Prince.

subtitles.original: スイートとまでは言わないが
subtitles.english: I won't go so far as to say a suite.

subtitles.original: 七面鳥もってこい これが七面鳥か
subtitles.english: Bring on the turkey! So this is what it's like...

subtitles.original: 思ってたよりデカいな
subtitles.english: It's bigger than I thought.

subtitles.original: やっぱり俺はチキンライスがいいや
subtitles.english: Actually, I think I'd rather have chicken rice.

subtitles.original: よし！あとは、ツリーをライトアップさせたら完成だ！
subtitles.english: Alright! All that's left is to light up the tree, and we're done!

subtitles.original: ということで、大三、よろしくね！パワーだよ！
subtitles.english: So, Daisan, I'm counting on you! Use your power!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ行きますよ！
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go!

subtitles.original: 大三、発電！行け！
subtitles.english: Daisan, generate power! Go!

subtitles.original: 行け！頑張れ、走れ、走れ！行け、行け、行け、行け、頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Go! Good luck, run, run! Go, go, go, go, you can do it!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ頑張ってる！頑張ってる！回し車を...
subtitles.english: He's working so hard! He's working hard on the wheel...

subtitles.original: お、すごいすごい！発電できてる！
subtitles.english: Oh, amazing! You're generating power!

subtitles.original: 行け行け！ファイト、ファイト！こっちか...
subtitles.english: Go, go! Fight, fight! This way...

subtitles.original: 団長もね、ちょっとエアでやるよ！やるやる！行けるよ！
subtitles.english: I'll do some air-running too! I'll do it! You can do it!

subtitles.original: ファイト、ファイト！大三、大三、頑張れ！大三！
subtitles.english: Fight, fight! Daisan, Daisan, you can do it! Daisan!

subtitles.original: あ、疲れてる...大三、ほっぺた膨らませながら...あ、息が...息がゼーゼー言ってる...
subtitles.english: Ah, he's tired... Daisan, your cheeks are puffed out... Oh, his breath... He's gasping for air...

subtitles.original: ちょっと、でも、大三...あ、ライト消えちゃった！ああ、どうしよう！
subtitles.english: Wait, but Daisan... Oh, the lights went out! Oh no, what should we do!

subtitles.original: でも、あれなの。それさ、ノエちゃんがその滑車回したいところだけど、ちょっとノエちゃんの体重じゃ、あの、壊れちゃうんで...
subtitles.english: But, here's the thing. I'd love to spin that wheel myself, but with my weight, well, it would break...

subtitles.original: 大三が頼みなんだ！ツリー完成目指して、走るんだ！頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Daisan, you're our only hope! Run so we can finish the tree! Good luck!

subtitles.original: 行け、頑張れ、頑張れ！頑張ってる、頑張ってる！
subtitles.english: Go, good luck, good luck! He's doing it, he's doing it!

subtitles.original: 行け、行け、頑張れ、頑張れ！あー頑張ってる！いいよ、いいよ！
subtitles.english: Go, go, good luck, good luck! Ah, he's working so hard! Good, good!

subtitles.original: 行け、行け！お、回ってる、回ってる！お、待って待って！
subtitles.english: Go, go! Oh, it's spinning, it's spinning! Oh, wait, wait!

subtitles.original: ツリー、あ、光り始めてる！すごいよ！
subtitles.english: The tree, oh, it's starting to light up! This is amazing!

subtitles.original: あ、いい、来てる来てる！光った光った！頑張れ、あともうちょっと！行け行け行け行け！
subtitles.english: Ah, yes, it's coming, it's coming! It lit up, it lit up! Good luck, just a little more! Go, go, go, go!
